mapper.select: SELECT cuChatSeq as chatSeq ,cuMemberSeq FROM chatUser JOIN chat ch ON ch.chatSeq = cuChatSeq AND ch.chatDelNy = 0 WHERE cuMemberSeq = #{cuMemberSeq}

SELECT cu.cuChatSeq as chatSeq ,cu.cuMemberSeq ,mmSeq ,mmNickname ,upm.upmPath as upPath ,upm.upmUuidName as upUuidName FROM chatUser cu JOIN member mm ON mm.mmSeq = cu.cuMemberSeq LEFT JOIN uploadMemberProfile upm ON mm.mmSeq = upm.upmMemberSeq AND upm.upmDelNy = 0 WHERE cu.cuChatSeq = #{chatSeq} AND cu.cuMemberSeq != #{cuMemberSeq}
